properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HOSPITAL_BD A WHERE A.HP_BD_CATEGORY_NO = 'FAQ'

SELECT A.HP_BD_NO , A.HP_BD_TITLE , A.HP_BD_CONTENT , A.HP_BD_DRAWUP_DATE , A.HP_BD_WATCHED , A.MEM_NAME , A.HP_BD_FILE , A.HP_MEM_NO , A.HP_BD_CATEGORY_NO FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , B.HP_BD_NO , B.HP_BD_TITLE , B.HP_BD_CONTENT , B.HP_BD_DRAWUP_DATE , B.HP_BD_WATCHED , B.MEM_NAME , B.HP_BD_FILE , B.HP_MEM_NO , B.HP_BD_CATEGORY_NO FROM (SELECT C.HP_BD_NO , C.HP_BD_TITLE , C.HP_BD_CONTENT , C.HP_BD_DRAWUP_DATE , C.HP_BD_WATCHED , D.MEM_NAME , C.HP_BD_FILE , C.HP_MEM_NO , C.HP_BD_CATEGORY_NO FROM HOSPITAL_BD C JOIN MEM_INFO D ON(C.HP_MEM_NO = D.MEM_NO) WHERE C.HP_BD_CATEGORY_NO = 'FAQ' ORDER BY C.HP_BD_NO DESC ) B ) A WHERE A.RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
UPDATE HOSPITAL_BD A SET A.HP_BD_WATCHED = (SELECT B.HP_BD_WATCHED + 1 FROM HOSPITAL_BD B WHERE B.HP_BD_NO = ? ) WHERE A.HP_BD_NO = ?

SELECT A.HP_BD_NO , A.HP_BD_TITLE , A.HP_BD_CONTENT , A.HP_BD_DRAWUP_DATE , A.HP_BD_WATCHED , B.MEM_NAME , A.HP_BD_FILE , A.HP_MEM_NO , A.HP_BD_CATEGORY_NO FROM HOSPITAL_BD A JOIN MEM_INFO B ON(A.HP_MEM_NO = B.MEM_NO) WHERE A.HP_BD_NO = ?
